text: Olga Harmony (April 23, 1928 â€“ November 11, 2018) was a Mexican playwright and a drama teacher. == Biography == She was born in Mexico City. Harmony studied at the National Autonomous University of Mexico. She worked at the Escuela Nacional Preparatoria. Harmony died in Mexico City on November 11, 2018 at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Writers from Mexico City Category:Mexican educators Category:Playwrights
title: Olga Harmony
